entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:01 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
